abstract: Series of studies in journals The Lancet and Lancet Global Health points to worsening diet and increased obesity around world, particularly in countries with rising incomes; trends are occurring in tandem with increase of advertising targeting children by Western junk food and snack manufacturers.
lead_paragraph: Some poor and middle-income countries with relatively healthy diets are being targeted by Western food companies with increased advertising.

headline.main: Food Habits Getting Worse Around the World
headline.print_headline: Food Habits Becoming Worse Around the World

snippet: Some poor and middle-income countries with relatively healthy diets are being targeted by Western food companies with increased advertising.
